sentence.Network_en: Megastars like Jack Nicholson, who made $500 million from Batman alone, are unlikely to be affected.
sentence.Network_cn: 像杰克·尼科尔森这样的巨星，单从《蝙蝠侠》一部片子中就赚了5亿美元，是不太可能受影响的。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 在线观看;蝙蝠侠 (Batman) 由Bob Kane与Bill Finger共同创造 (但是只有Bob Kane获得官方著名为作者),是个伸张正义打击犯罪的超级英雄。虽然一开始蝙蝠侠只是数个.

looks like batman brought his own robin ., 看着就像蝙蝠侠带来了他的罗宾.
A platoon leader follows a batman one day , the dialog is as follows ..., 有位排长有天跟一个小兵 , 对话如下.
no , I meant . never mind . hey , check it out , I got you a batman cookie jar .不，我是指…，算了。来看看这个，我给你买了个蝙蝠侠饼干罐。

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 18th cent. (originally denoting an orderly in charge of the bat horse 'pack-horse' which carried the officer's baggage): from Old French bat (from medieval Latin bastum 'packsaddle') + man

entry.def: In the British armed forces, an officer's batman is his personal servant.

example.tran: 他的勤务兵送来的早茶

means.word_mean: 1. an orderly assigned to serve a British military officer
